proposal: #468 - Moralis Project Proposal: Integration & Support for Moonbeam
rationale: Moralis integrates Moonbeam fully, creates adoption content. Integration cost: 31,500 DOT.
details: Moralis is a trusted platform with extensive developer support, and the integration costs are justified. Additionally, supporting Astar EVM integration would be beneficial.

rationale: Polkalator calculates staking rewards based on various staking durations.
details: The tool looks very unprofessional and it's not worthy the small tip, because it really seems that nobody will use it.

proposal: #432 - Bifrost Foundation - 500k DOT liquidity loan for Bifrost LST vDOT
rationale: Bifrost is independently applying to the Polkadot treasury for a 1-year liquidity loan of 500k DOT. The loan will be repaid in full including staking rewards to the Polkadot treasury.
details: Bifrost has consistently proven its value in the ecosystem, with Bifrost on Kusama successfully managing KSM loans from the treasury. AYE.

proposal: #408 - Sasha - Fellowship, Proposal-01: PoC and Prototype. ink! + Ethereum RPC = ethink!
rationale: ethink! aims for Ethereum RPC compatibility for smart contracts parachains. AYE.
details: Providing a seamless migration for dApp developers and users from the Ethereum ecosystem to Polkadot, without altering the UI/UX, is a significant step toward attracting a broader user base.

proposal: #343 - Set BEEFY genesis (thus starting BEEFY consensus on Kusama)
rationale: This sets BEEFY genesis to the next block after it executes, thus enabling BEEFY consensus on Kusama.
details: Enabling BEEFY consensus on Kusama sets the stage for the Kusama<>Ethereum Snowfork bridge. Very beneficial for Kusama and later for Polkadot. AYE.

rationale: By that referendum approved, HydraDX will add GLMR to the Omnipool.
details: Having GLMR in the Omnipool will boost the usage of it, which will benefit both HydraDX and Moonbeam.
